text:
A List of some Philosophical and other Curious Books, desired by the Printer of these Tracts, (by whom they are to be had,) to be mentioned here:

Homae Bartholomini Acta Medica & Philosophica Haffniensia An. 1673, figurae aeneis ornata, volumen secundum. Hafnia in 4°.

Guernerii Rollinici Epitome Methodi Cognoscendi & Curandi Particulares Corporis Affectionis edita secunda Erfurt in 4°.

Riolani Enchiridium Anatomicum cum Var. Opuscula, in 8°.

Christiani Adolphi Balduini Aurum Aure Hermeticum, in 12°.

Hermannii Grube de Transplantatione Morborum Analysis nova, in 8°.

Jacobi Barncri Prodromus Sennerti novi seu Delineatio novi Medicine Systematis, Augusae Vindelicor. in 4°.

Hieronymi Mercurialis de Arte Gymnastica Libri Sex, in quibus Exercitationum omnium veteriarum genera, loca, modi, facultates, & quidquid denique ad Corporis Humani Exercitationes pertinet, diligentiter Explicatur, in 4°.

Francisci Redi Experimenta circa res naturales, praesertim eas que huc ex Indiis adferuntur, cum figuris aeneis, in 12°.

Ejusdem Observationes de Viperis, in 12°.

Laurentii Pignorii de servis & eorum apud veteres Ministeriis Commentarius cum fig. aeneis in 12°.

Mappi Dissertationes Medicae de pomo calido, in 4°.

Athanaei Kircheri Area Neo in tres Libros Digesta, in Fol.

Martini Forbisseri Historia Navigationis ex Anglia in Septentrionis Occidentis traditum susceps, in Latinum translat, in 4°.

Agidii Strauchii Aphorismi Astrologici, Methodice Collecti, cum Medicina Doctrina Cypriani Leovitii de Judiciis Nativitatum, in 12°.

Ejusdem de Numerorum Doctrina Aphorismi, in 12°.

Wolfgangi Wedelii Opiologia ad mentem Academiae Naturae Curiosorum, in 4°.

Frider. Hoffmanni M. D. Animadversiones cum Annotationibus in Pharmacopoeiam Schroderianam, in 4°.

Georg. Wolfgangi Wedelii Exercitationes pathologicae, in 4°.

Tumba Semiramidis Hermoticum sigillata, in 12°.

Georg. Wolfgangi Wedelii Experimentum Chymicum novum de Sale Volatili Plantarum, in 12°.

Joh. Christiani Frommians Tractatus de Fascinatione novus & singularis, in quo fascinatio Vulgaria profligatur, Naturalis confirmatur, & Magica examinatur, Theologis Jurisperitis & Medicis lectu utilis, in 4°.
Respirationis Swammerdamianae Expiratio, una cum Anatomia Neologica Joannis de Radi &c. Authore Joh. Baptista à Lamzwoorde, in 8°.

Johan. Jacobi Wepferi Observationes Anatomicæ ex Cadaveribus eorum quos suftulit Apoplexia, cum Excitatione de ejus loco affecto, novis Observationibus additis: Scaffhusii, in 8°.

Hercules Medicus sive Locorum Communium, Authore Wolfgang. Hofero, 2 Voll., 4°.

Marggravii Materia Medica contraicta, exhibens Simplicitas & Composita Medicamenta, in 4°.

Hermetis Ægyptiorum & Chemicorum Sapientia ab Herm. Conringii Animadversionibus vindicata per Olaium Borrirhium, in 4°.

Phil. Hoechstetteri Observationum Medicinalium decades 10, in 8°.

Franc. de le Boe Sylvii Praxeos Medicæ liber quartus, in 12°.

Theod. Turqueti D. de Mayerne tractatus de Arthritide, in 12°.

Andr. Moellenbroccii Cochlearia Curiosa, in 8°.

Honorati Fabri Epistolæ tres de sua Hypothesi Philosophica.

Rohaulti tractatus Physicus, in 12°.

Jo. Elsholtii Distillatoria Curiosa, in 8°.

Rationale Vulnerum Lethalium Judicium, Auth. Cott. Wellch. in 8°.

Math. Tillingii prodromus Praxeos Chimiatricæ, in 8°.

H. Vogleri de Valetudine Hominis cognoscenda, in 4°.

Dan. Lodovicus de Volatilitate Salis Tartari dissertatio, in 12°.

LONDON,

Printed for John Martyn, Printer to the Royal Society, 1675.

jstor_metadata.title: A List of Some Philosophical and Other Curious Books, Desired by the Printer of These Tracts, (by Whom They are to be Had,) to be Mentioned Here
